Title: Silverlight Menu Control
Description:
This is a cutom silverlight menu control.  It's very simple to use and can save you ton of time making your own menu control.

The download contains a full documentation on how to use it.

*New: added support for nested menus.*
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a cutom silverlight menu control. It's very simple to use and can save you ton of time making your own menu control.

The download contains a full documentation on how to use it.

*New: added support for nested menus.*


The control is skinnable. You can see a demo here: http://mher.info/SLMenu
